vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting an amendment to Specific Use Permit No. 2215 for the sale of alcoholic beverages in conjunction with a general merchandise or food store 3,500 square feet or less on property zoned an RR-D-1 Regional Retail District with a D-1 Liquor Control Overlay, on the southwest corner of North Jim Miller Road and East R.L. Thornton Freeway
Recommendation of Staff:  Approval for a three-year period, subject to revised conditions
Recommendation of CPC:  Approval for a three-year period, subject to revised conditions
Z223-151(LG)
